titleStmt.title: The city remembrancer. Or, A sermon preached to the native-citizens, of London, at their solemn assembly in Pauls on Tuesday, the 23 of June, A.D. MDCLVII. / By Edm. Calamy B.D. and pastor of the church at Aldermanbury.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for John Baker, at the sign of the Peacock in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
